# 数智菩提树

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shuzhi-putishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shuzhi-putishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shuzhi-putishu
shuzhi-putishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shuzhi-putishu
shuzhi-putishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
